name: Pirate Command WIP
description:
In this short demo you take command of 3 separate pirate ships and traverse the dangerous seas while testing your battle skills.

There are 3 targets hidden throughout the randomly generated map that you need to discover and obliterate with your array of powerful cannons!

This game is currently a work in progress and is meant to serve as a proof of concept for what could some day become a more in depth experience.

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE leave us some feedback on this short survey

https://take.supersurvey.com/Q09RRJLQO

We will take your comments into account as we continue to develop the game. 

Created by RcklessRogue and CheekyBean
